https://tmrev.io/movie/717704-Biology Made Un-easy 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aAxSD9qcIyE60mg5dQp0d0WH66n.jpg A close look at the microscopic world that surrounds us. Within each basic human interaction there is something strange festering under the surface, and we just need a good magnifying glass and a strong stomach to see it. This film was made as part of the fourth edition of the NFB's Hothouse apprenticeship. Biology Made Un-easy
